thread.section_title: Constant Contact Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Constant Contact | www.constantcontact.com
thread.title: Erich Morris
thread.title_full: Constant Contact reviewed by Erich Morris

author: Erich Morris
title: Erich Morris
text: I enjoy communicating with our 6, 000 member church congregation through Constant Contact (CC). The reporting that come with each email blast allows me to keep up with the congregation. As any living organism, I manage our demographic database from the reporting from CC. Customer Service is outstanding each and every time we need to call.
